Name: Havana Special
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim & speared Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A Pineapple Daiquiri with an added something – a touch of flavoursome ash-aged maraschino liqueur. When garnishing the pineapple may be optional but the cherry is a must-have.
Nutrition: One serving of Havana Special contains 168 calories
